entry.title: Promises & Frustrations
entry.summary:
Author: Brittknee42

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,814Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: "I swear I am gonna look out for him.” Buck tries to comfort her. “I made sure he mentioned Bobby to the trainers so they would know he was a legacy. I made sure Chim had us listed for a probie so he would get assigned to the 118. I am going to make sure I am the one training him. I will protect your son. I promise.”“That's what worries me.” Athena says.OrHarry is the new probie at the 118. Buck promises Athena he will look out for him, and naturally ends up in danger. Of course Eddie has feelings about it.

entry.title: A day in the life of your parents being firefighters
entry.summary:
Author: stargazingstormtrooper92

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,311Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: "Damn, look how dad looks at Buck (we see them exchanging heart eyes), just because he wants blueberry pancakes even though he just last night ate the last of the bluberries like a rabid racoon after their movie night. Wait, did he just? Omg, I can't with these two. I need to tell Denny." We see Buck and Eddie hip bumping over the dishes both wanting to wash them. Then Buck, with wet and soapy hands takes Eddie by waist and moves him a feet to the left and starts washing the fishes. Eddie blushes and then takes a drying rag and waits for Buck to finish washing dish by dish. Christopher takes a video of the whole scene and sends it to Denny. "In case you didn't know washing the dishes usually takes two people." "Lol, your dads are ..." "Exausting. See you at school." *** Or: Chris, Denny, Mara and Jee's POV on our completely clueless favourite Uncles of the 118.

entry.title: Remember? (Snippet/Spoiler)
entry.summary:
Author: buddiesongfic

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 919Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 6

Summary: The gym smelled like lemon cleaner and old confetti. Streamers hung half-torn from the rafters, fluttering gently in the draft from the open doors. The senior send-off had ended hours ago, but somehow Buck and Eddie were still there, cleaning up what felt like a small hurricane’s aftermath. “You missed a spot,” Eddie said from the bleachers, gesturing with a broom. Buck shot him a look over his shoulder, a grin tugging at his lips. “You’re just saying that so you don’t have to help.” “Maybe.” “Unbelievable,” Buck muttered, but his tone was light. He bent to pick up a balloon that had half-deflated, the rubber squeaking between his fingers. OR; After a party at their school, Buck and Eddie are tasked to clean the gym after. After getting feelings for the past few years, Eddie decided to...?

entry.title: like a feather of flames on me
entry.summary:
Author: Val_in_a_trenchcoat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,671Chapters: 9/22Kudos: 92

Summary: Evan – Buck – Buckley is a twenty-eight-year old broke college student recently ripped away from his childhood dream job as a firefighter after a life-shattering accident left him permanently disabled. Living on what’s left of his savings while going to college won’t keep him fed, though… but nobody has to know about his scandalous job on the side with Redline Pleasure Anonymous Call Agency. Eddie Diaz is a recently divorced, thirty-year-old college professor and father to the best kid in the world. In light of his recent split, though, he’s made a discovery: his sexuality might not be as straight and narrow as he’s always thought. Instead of panicking, though, he makes the safe, sensible (and budget-breaking) decision to set a hypothesis and test it by calling in to a sex hotline to talk to a male agent. Everyone experiments in college, right? Even the professors. Enter the mysterious Firehose – the hot voice on the other side of the line that Eddie can’t get out of his head.And Buck might just be getting a little crush on the hot professor he keeps doing silent study sessions with in the college library.What will they do when it all collides? [updates every Thursday]

entry.title: i see trouble (and i want him to come my way)
entry.summary:
Author: neonweeknds

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 69,708Chapters: 9/24Kudos: 34

Summary: Buck was riding the high of his first successful solo debut, still nursing the ache of someone who walked away, when he got news that blindsided him—his upcoming solo tour wouldn’t be so solo after all. He’d be sharing the stage with Eddie Diaz, a rising country star with a mysterious past and a sound that was quickly blowing up. At first, Buck hated the idea. The last thing he wanted was to split the spotlight he’d fought so hard for. But then he actually got to know Eddie. The problem? Buck had always blurred the line between friendship and something more—and with Eddie, it was getting harder to tell the difference. or the pop star evan buckley and country singer eddie diaz slow burn angsty friends to lovers au.

entry.title: take care of me
entry.summary:
Author: kryptonian

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,438Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 73

Summary: Her grip loosens a little, a brow raised as she holds his face. “What’s up?” He drops the weight of his head against her hand, sighing dramatically. “You’re just hot.” “Buck.” “I’m serious! You—” His hands start moving with his words, gesturing vaguely toward her. “You’re all beautiful and hot and competent and the gloves and the like—the look in your eye. How am I not supposed to get hard, Eddie? Riddle me that.” She laughs, cheek dimpling on the side as she rolls her eyes, releasing his face from the grip of her gloved hand. “You’re such an idiot.” He whines. “No, Eddie, I’m serious. It’s—It’s becoming a problem!” He doesn’t mean for it all to spill out. He could’ve left it at calling her hot, but now that he’s started, the words just keep tumbling out. “I’m getting turned on at work watching you help people, and then at home, you’re doing this for me, and I just want—” He comes to a halt. Biting the inside of his cheek. Eddie is halfway through removing the glove from her right hand, fingers hooked into the wrist of it, her eyes suddenly focused intently on him. “What do you want?” OR Kinktober day 23: Medical Play

entry.title: count on me
entry.summary:
Author: strawberryshoyo

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,198Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 296

Summary: “Okay,” Chim said, voice rough but steady. “That’s it. It’s down. Everyone in one piece?” “Good here,” Ravi said, brushing dust off his jacket. “Same,” Harry added. “Yep,” Eddie said with a short, sarcastic laugh. “And you called me ridiculous for not trusting technology. Guess I was right all along, huh?” He waited for the usual comeback, the snort, the eye-roll, something from Buck to break the tension. But all that came back was a wet, choking gurgle. Snapping his attention to the source, Eddie saw Buck leaning against the wall, hands gripping his throat, blood seeping through his fingers. Eddie froze.   or the one where Buck doesn't escape from the robots completely unscathed. (9x02 coda)

entry.title: giving up (on doing this alone)
entry.summary:
Author: SymphonySoldier97

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,724Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 288

Summary: Prepared, Eddie ticks off the facts on his fingers. “We’re trapped underground, no way anyone topside is getting to us before our air runs out, not with all the other people up there who need saving, and the only way you’ll be strong enough to get us out is if you feed. What more do I need to know?” Buck’s face falls, fight starting to drain out of him like bathwater circling a drain. His eyes are sunken into their sockets, and his irises are enlarging, the dark limbal ring around them getting more pronounced. He’s stopped pretending to breathe, so still where he sits. When he speaks, Eddie catches the flash of fangs. If he’s too tired to even try to appear human, he needs this even more than Eddie expected. “It’s just… if I feed off of you, it’s gonna, uh… you’re going to feel it.” “Feel what? Your teeth? Yeah, I expected as much, Buck.” “No,” Buck rubs a hand over the back of his neck, clearly embarrassed for some reason Eddie can’t parse. “No, you’re gonna feel… turned on. You’ll probably get, uh, h-hard, and you probably won’t be able to help it. You’ll lose all your in-inhibitions, and you’ll need to get off.” Oh. Oh, well, yeah, he supposes that does add another layer to things.

entry.title: Unconditional Love
entry.summary:
Author: villayuly1987

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,790Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 16

Summary: Evan is Bobby’s biological son from a previous marriage; Athena is his stepmother)This story is set six months after a major virus exposure. Eddie has returned home from Texas to help out Chimney, who is temporarily stepping in as captain of the 118 firehouse while the actual captain, Bobby, is in a medically induced coma fighting the virus.During the six months apart, Eddie and Evan grew incredibly close, leading to a secret relationship between them. Evan is struggling significantly with his father's condition, spending almost all his time at the hospital, barely sleeping or eating. Eddie is actively trying to take care of him, even having to drag Evan out of the hospital to rest.
